titles.title: Citizens Protection Act of 2007
To repeal the Gun-Free School Zones Act of 1990 and amendments to that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
5/22/2007--Introduced.
Citizens Protection Act of 2007 - Repeals provisions of the federal criminal code that prohibit the possession of a firearm in a school zone.
